languages.text: {n}Ваша строгая речь пугает Мариуса.{/n} "Я верный сын Империума и никогда прежде не помышлял оставить свой труд на корабле. Но что, если мне уготовано иное предназначение? Как могу я оставить без внимания послание свыше?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша строгая речь пугает Мариуса.{/n} "Я верный сын Империума и никогда прежде не помышлял оставить свой труд на корабле. Но что, если мне уготовано иное предназначение? Как могу я оставить без внимания послание свыше?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have until now never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from above?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have until now never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from above?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from above?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from above?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

{n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

languages.text: {n}Bien qu'effrayé par votre ton sévère, Marius ne se démonte pas.{/n} « Je suis un loyal fils de l'Imperium et je n'avais jusqu'alors jamais envisagé d'abandonner mes responsabilités à bord de ce vaisseau, mais ne se pourrait-il pas que ma véritable vocation soit différente ? Comment pourrais-je ignorer un message envoyé par l'Empereur lui-même ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien qu'effrayé par votre ton sévère, Marius ne se démonte pas.{/n} « Je suis un loyal fils de l'Imperium et je n'avais jusqu'alors jamais envisagé d'abandonner mes responsabilités à bord de ce vaisseau, mais ne se pourrait-il pas que ma véritable vocation soit différente ? Comment pourrais-je ignorer un message envoyé par l'Empereur lui-même ? »

languages.text: {n}La severidad de tu tono asusta a Marius.{/n} «Soy un hijo leal del Imperium, y hasta la fecha nunca he pensado siquiera en abandonar mi deber para con la nave. ¿Pero y si mi vocación fuese otra? ¿Cómo podría ignorar Su llamada?».
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La severidad de tu tono asusta a Marius.{/n} «Soy un hijo leal del Imperium, y hasta la fecha nunca he pensado siquiera en abandonar mi deber para con la nave. ¿Pero y si mi vocación fuese otra? ¿Cómo podría ignorar Su llamada?».

languages.text: {n}马吕斯被你严厉的语气吓坏了。{/n}“我一直都是帝国虔诚的子嗣，此时此刻也不例外。我从来没打算舍弃我在这艘船上的职责。不过，如果我真的身怀其他使命呢？我怎么可能忽视帝皇给我的启示？”
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}马吕斯被你严厉的语气吓坏了。{/n}“我一直都是帝国虔诚的子嗣，此时此刻也不例外。我从来没打算舍弃我在这艘船上的职责。不过，如果我真的身怀其他使命呢？我怎么可能忽视帝皇给我的启示？”

languages.text: {n}あなたの厳しい声のトーンは、マリウスを怯えさせた。{/n}「私は帝国の忠実な息子であり、この船での任務を放棄するという考えを持ったことはありません。しかし、もし私の使命が違っていたら？主からのメッセージを無視できますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの厳しい声のトーンは、マリウスを怯えさせた。{/n}「私は帝国の忠実な息子であり、この船での任務を放棄するという考えを持ったことはありません。しかし、もし私の使命が違っていたら？主からのメッセージを無視できますか？」

languages.text: {n}Dein strenger Ton macht Marius Angst.{/n} "Ich bin ein treuer Sohn des Imperiums und habe bisher noch nie auch nur daran gedacht, meine Pflichten auf diesem Schiff zu vernachlässigen. Doch was, wenn meine Berufung eine andere ist? Wie könnte ich eine Botschaft des Imperators ignorieren?"
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein strenger Ton macht Marius Angst.{/n} "Ich bin ein treuer Sohn des Imperiums und habe bisher noch nie auch nur daran gedacht, meine Pflichten auf diesem Schiff zu vernachlässigen. Doch was, wenn meine Berufung eine andere ist? Wie könnte ich eine Botschaft des Imperators ignorieren?"

languages.text: {n}Katı ses tonun Marius'u korkutuyor.{/n} "Ben İmparatorluk'un sadık bir evladıyım ve bu gemideki vazifelerimi terk etme fikrini şimdiye kadar bir kez olsun aklımdan geçirmedim. Ancak ya benim hayatta farklı bir amacım varsa? O'ndan gelen bir mesajı nasıl görmezden gelebilirim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Your stern tone frightens Marius.{/n} "I am a loyal son of the Imperium and have, until now, never entertained the idea of abandoning my duties on this ship. But what if mine is a different calling? How could I ignore a message from Him?"
